## RumInitConfiguration.trackViewsManually property

Allows you to control RUM views creation. See <a href="https://docs.datadoghq.com/real_user_monitoring/browser/advanced_configuration/?tab=npm#override-default-rum-view-names">Override default RUM view names</a> for further information.

**Signature:**

```typescript
trackViewsManually?: boolean | undefined;
```
